channel.title: Comments on: Chef recipe to install VSTS agents (Windows)
channel.description: A blog about things I learn at the keyboard: DevOps, CI/CD, Cloud, Automation, to name a few....

item.title: By: sivakumarvaddi
item.dc:creator: sivakumarvaddi
item.description:
Hi Marcus,
Great post!
looking for similar recipe to install VS2015 can you help.
1. vs2015 was in localwebserver say http://locahost/VS2015 2.Install vs2015 profession 64 bit or 32 bit depend on OS.
Thanks, Sivas
item.content:encoded:
Hi Marcus,

Great post!

looking for similar recipe to install VS2015 can you help.

1. vs2015 was in localwebserver say http://locahost/VS2015
2.Install vs2015 profession 64 bit or 32 bit depend on OS.

Thanks,
Sivas

item.title: By: Dillon Thompson
item.dc:creator: Dillon Thompson
item.description: Man, I never even thought of being able to automate this. Life saver!
item.content:encoded: Man, I never even thought of being able to automate this. Life saver!
